name.value: Cardiology: Inpatient Heparin Anticoagulation Protocol Rule

title.value: Cardiology: Inpatient Heparin Anticoagulation Protocol Rule

display.value: Hospitalists, Residents and other ordering providers involved in managing the patient cohort
Adult patients
Adult (person)
Surgical and Medical Service
Adult inpatients requiring therapeutic anticoagulation management

title.value: Acute DVT of Leg Treated with Vitamin K Antagonist

description.value: Notify the provider that the patient is a candidate for intravenous unfractionated heparin, although other options may be preferred.

display.value: Notify the provider that the patient is a candidate for intravenous unfractionated heparin, although other options may be preferred.

description.value: Generate the Inpatient Heparin Anticoagulation Order Set KNART.

display.value: Generate the Inpatient Heparin Anticoagulation Order Set KNART.

display.value: Generate the Inpatient Heparin Anticoagulation Order Set KNART.

description.value: Notify the provider that the patient is a candidate for intravenous unfractionated heparin, although other options may be preferred.

title.value: Acute DVT of Leg with Thrombectomy

description.value: Notify the provider that the patient is a candidate for intravenous unfractionated heparin, although other options may be preferred.

display.value: Notify the provider that the patient is a candidate for intravenous unfractionated heparin, although other options may be preferred.

description.value: Notify the provider that the patient should be considered for the same intensity and duration of anticoagulation therapy irrespective of the thrombosis removal.

display.value: Notify the provider that the patient should be considered for the same intensity and duration of anticoagulation therapy irrespective of the thrombosis removal.

description.value: Generate the Inpatient Heparin Anticoagulation Order Set KNART.

display.value: Generate the Inpatient Heparin Anticoagulation Order Set KNART.

title.value: Perioperative Anticoagulation with Mechanical Heart Valve, Atrial Fibrillation, or VTE at High Risk for Additional Thromboembolism

description.value: Notify the provider that the patient should be managed according to the American College of Chest Physicians perioperative anticoagulation management guidelines (https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC3278059/).

display.value: Notify the provider that the patient should be managed according to the American College of Chest Physicians perioperative anticoagulation management guidelines (https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC3278059/).

title.value: Perioperative Anticoagulation with UFH - Timing of Pre-surgical Stopping of UFH

display.value: Notify the provider that the patient should be managed according to the American College of Chest Physicians perioperative anticoagulation management guidelines (https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC3278059/).

title.value: Pregnancy with Antiphospholipid Antibodies (APLA) Syndrome

description.value: Notify the provider that the patient should be managed according to the American College of Chest Physicians pregnancy anticoagulation guidelines (https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC3278054/).

display.value: Notify the provider that the patient should be managed according to the American College of Chest Physicians pregnancy anticoagulation guidelines (https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC3278054/).
